subject: Hurling (Sport)
lead_paragraph: Whether it is a low-level match on a rural field in County Galway or the intercounty final at Croke Park in Dublin, hurling is an amateur endeavor that sparks Ireland’s passions.
snippet: Whether it is a low-level match on a rural field in County Galway or the intercounty final at Croke Park in Dublin, hurling is an amateur endeavor that sparks Ireland’s passions.
